transcript.text: Hello, welcome to Barclays Bank. I’m your banking assistant.
Hello, welcome to Barclays Bank. I’m your banking assistant.How can I help today?
Hello, welcome to Barclays Bank. I’m your banking assistant.How can I help today?

Hello, I think someone has cloned my card and made an unauthorized transaction at Pret. I don't recall making any purchases there, so I'd like to dispute the charge and get my money back. My account number is 12345678 and the sort code is 112233.
